name: Analytical
description: Asking the right questions is half the battle.

name: Reflective
description: Looking back so that you can move forward.

name: Curious
description: Curiosity is the spark behind the spark of every great idea.

name: Flexible
description: Be stubborn about your goals and flexible about your methods.

name: Interpersonal
description: If everyone is thinking alike then no-one is thinking.

name: Persistent
description: Impossible only means you haven't found the answer yet.

name: Adventurous
description: Some call it adventure, you call it a way of life.

name: Independent
description: You are in control of the outcome.
